moves.name: Barrage
moves.description: Round objects are hurled at the target to strike two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Uproar
moves.description: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. Over that time, no one can fall asleep.

moves.name: Hypnosis
moves.description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

moves.name: Reflect
moves.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from physical attacks for five turns.

moves.name: Leech Seed
moves.description: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.

moves.name: Bullet Seed
moves.description: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target. Two to five seeds are shot in rapid succession.

moves.name: Stun Spore
moves.description: The user scatters a cloud of paralyzing powder. It may leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Poison Powder
moves.description: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust on the target. It may poison the target.

moves.name: Sleep Powder
moves.description: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.

moves.name: Confusion
moves.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: Worry Seed
moves.description: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making its Ability Insomnia.

moves.name: Natural Gift
moves.description: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines its type and power.

moves.name: Solar Beam
moves.description: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the second turn.

moves.name: Extrasensory
moves.description: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Bestow
moves.description: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn't holding an item.
